com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay

Class NMapPOIdataOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapOverlay
      • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapItemizedOverlay
        • com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay.NMapPOIdataOverlay

  • public class NMapPOIdataOverlay
extends NMapItemizedOverlay
    Wrapper class for a POI data overlay on map view.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Interface for listeners interested in when the state change of info layers.
      static interface  NMapPOIdataOverlay.OnStateChangeListener
      Interface for listeners interested in when the state change of overlay data such as focused Item changes and a callout is clicked.

                  NMapController mapController,
                  NMapOverlayManager mapOverlayManager)
        Construct a new NMapPOIdataOverlay.
        Parameters:
        poiData - An instance of NMapPOIdata which contains POI data.
        defaultMarker - default marker for POI data. it could be null.
        mapController - it should no not be null.
        mapOverlayManager - it could be null.

        public void showAllPOIdata(int zoomLevel)
        Show all POI data.
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - 0 to show all POI data in the NMapView, otherwise it is centered with the given zoom level.

        Parameters:
        longitude - longitude location in GRS coordinates
        latitude - latitude location in GRS coordinates
        Returns:

      • onTap

        protected boolean onTap(int index)
        Description copied from class: NMapItemizedOverlay
        Override this method to handle a "tap" on an item. This could be from a touchscreen tap on an onscreen Item, or from a trackball click on a centered, selected Item. By default, does nothing and returns false.
        Overrides:
        onTap in class NMapItemizedOverlay

      • createItem

        Description copied from class: NMapItemizedOverlay

        Specified by:
        createItem in class NMapItemizedOverlay
        Parameters:
        idx - item index in this overlay
